thread.section_title: ScreenPrinting.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenPrinting.com | screenprinting.com
thread.title: Kristen

author: Kristen
title: Kristen
text: I've ordered a few things from Ryonet and have had only great experiences. After only two uses one of my screens tore as the emulsion hardened (could've been user error) and when I reached out they happily shipped me a new one free of charge! Really great customer service. I also have watched a number of informative videos on the youtube channel to help with my at-home set up. I will continue to use them as my source for materials and info!
